short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slowly chickens your websites over time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Slowly, Chicken" slowly chickens websites you view, eventually replacing all of the words on the page with the word "chicken".

These changes don't get in the way of your work: only your inactive background tabs will be chickened. If you leave a tab in the background for less than five minutes, no words will be changed. 

If a tab is backgrounded for long enough to become unintelligible... were you really using it?



---
Inspired by the Cageify extension, and research by Doug Zongker: 
As PDF: https://isotropic.org/papers/chicken.pdf
As video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yL_-1d9OSdk
